title: ADDITIONAL PROTECTION
fullText:
All heating cables shall be provided with additional protection by an RCD with a fixed rated residual current not exceeding 30 mA, andâ€”
(a) in the case of heating units fitted with a conductive covering, this covering shall be earthed;
(b) in the case of under-floor heating units without a conductive covering, an earthed metallic grid with a spacing not exceeding 30 mm shall be provided above the under-floor heating cable; and
(c) heating units shall be provided with adequate mechanical protection to prevent damage.
